title: Low-Key Races, Big Implications: 5 Big Storylines to Open European Road Racing
content:
Tour de Hoody: The stakes are high in the early season races, even if the prestige is not. Here are the hottest story lines and hype I'm most stoked about to open 2025.

Read the full article at Low-Key Races, Big Implications: 5 Big Storylines to Open European Road Racing on Velo.
